It is quite unusual that accounts of surveys organizers and of respondents will be different. How will they differ from each other? The main difference is the functional. Also, for example, the accounts for freelancers and clients on freelance platforms are different.   You say that modern technologies of blockchain and smart-contracts will be introduced into the system. Won't there be more innovative features on the service? At the moment we‚Äôre focused in the implementation of decentralization and blockchain, but we‚Äôre open for new ideas in case of necessity, especially if they can improve the efficiency of our platform.   Good day! I would like to know how well the distributed storage module will be protected from hacking and data modification? The data in the blockchain can be changed only in case several parties agree to do it. As for the cracks, they‚Äôre impossible to damage the data stored in blockchain.   That‚Äôs true nobody trusts the results of elections today. What country would you choose first for presidential election? There havent been any offers yet. At the moment we‚Äôre focused on the work out of the details of our project.   You are challenging a big company - SurveyMonkey. How are you going to compete with it? We have the main advantage:  blockchain technologies and decentralization, they‚Äôre able to take the transparency of the voting to the completely new level.

It uses Blockchain technologies and smart contracts providing transparency and honesty of polls, votings, elections, testings, and other activities on the base of the platform. Author: alexzuzin
Title: ‚úîÔ∏è ‚ö°Ô∏è‚ö°Ô∏è‚ö°Ô∏è [ANN] VOTES Presale ‚Äì PLATFORM for taking votes of any level!
Body: Hello!  I‚Äôd like to present you our project ‚Äì VOTES.  VOTES is an international platform for taking votes of any level. It uses Blockchain technologies and smart contracts providing transparency and honesty of polls, votings, elections, testings, and other activities on the base of the platform.  At the present moment, VOTES is based on Russia‚Äôs largest online voting service Simpoll.ru. More than 10 mln people have become the users of the service during the whole time of its existence. Among the system‚Äôs clients there are such large companies as Samsung, Bosch, Adidas, Re:Store, and tens of thousands of other companies.  What problem does VOTES solve? The main problem resided in centralized recording and storage of information about the votes. This problem is solved by VOTES platform with smart-contracts and the Blockchain technology thanks to the decentralized infrastructure.  How do we use Blockchain? Thus, polls / votes / elections based on VOTES can not be fabricated or falsified. To distort the results, scammers will need to change the whole chain of records, which is impossible.  Why is it worth investing in VOTES? We are confident in the continued growth of the value of VOTES tokens. 60% of the funds collected under ICO are intended to be invested in marketing and attracting customers. They will create a demand for tokens, which are required for organizing voting and elections on the platform.  We plan to conduct pre-ICO on August 1 and release 10 million tokens within its framework. More information can be found on our website and in WhitePaper.  Site: http://votesplatform.com WhitePaper: https://votesplatform.com/assets/whitepaper/votes_whitepaper_en.pdf
